recipesJson.name: Red is the new Orange
recipesJson.author: MarkSr
recipesJson.description: This is a play on Orange Fanta with subtle hints of Raspberry and Coconut to finish it off.. It is a super fruity and zero sweetener. The Cactus makes the vape super juicy with the slight hint of tart and sour to mess with your taste buds as you vape it. I used the Black Currant as a buffer to slightly enhance the Raspberry and it worked just right.. This is a nice SNV and it could be a daily vape.
